snippet: Once the company’s plan for liquidating is approved, the A.&P. on Riverdale Avenue in the Bronx will shut. And the chain, born just before the Civil War, will vanish from New York.
abstract: A & P grocery store on Riverdale Avenue in Bronx is last of chain's stores in New York City; chain began in city just before Civil War, but company plans to shutter Bronx store once its plan for liquidation following its declaration of bankruptcy is approved.
lead_paragraph: Once the company’s plan for liquidating is approved, the A.&P. on Riverdale Avenue in the Bronx will shut. And the chain, born just before the Civil War, will vanish from New York.

headline.main: A.& P. Bankruptcy Means New York, Chain’s Birthplace, Will Lose Last Store
headline.print_headline: A.& P. Bankruptcy Means Losing the Chain’s Last Store in New York

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: The Great Atlantic & Pacific Tea Co (A&P)
